songs.lyrics:
Smokey EZ wider with hash, fuck bitches from other state
Valet bringing my cars, the waiter to bring me plates
Smokey EZ wider with hash, fuck bitches from other state
He celebrating buying drinks, we celebrating buying drinks
Ugh, its Young Khalifa man (The usual suspects [x2]) (Yeah!)
Rostrum Records in this bitch (Yeah!) Taylor Gang or die

I saw you at the bar with, a couple of your friends
I'm thinking you can bring em all
Soon as I hit the door, to hit the floor
I'm on some star shit
Before I know, I got a bad bitch up in my car (car)
I throw out my cigar, hit the gas and I'm gone
She know what it is
So ain't no need to ask where we goin(goin)
A glass of Patron, out the bottle got you ready
I'm gonna make it hot
Girl you don't forget it, I tell her, what you tell her?
I could make you famous, I could make you famous
You been small timin darling
I can make you major
Wanna know if I can get you home?
Hope we don't wake the neighbors
She lick her lollipop
And I'm her favorite flavor (yeaahh)

Smokey EZ wider with hash, fuck bitches from other state
Valet bringing my cars, the waiter to bring me plates
Smokey EZ wider with hash, fuck bitches from other state
He celebrating buying drinks, we celebrating buying drinks

You see I'm different from what you accustomed to
Flashing lights, when I pull up
I'll have you telling all your little friends
About the cars, about the cribs(about the cribs)
And how a young nigga do ya
You a bad bitch, and you ain't like them same girls
Ain't my only one, but I'll make you my main girl
When niggas call your phone, you like click, click, click
We posing for them cameras, like flick, flick, flick
What can I say but?
My life is like a movie (yeahh)
My life is like a movie (yeahh)
And I can have you in that star roll
Just like you should be (like you should be)
I do these things, magazines, booty scenes
And you a pop bottle, top model, beauty queen

Smokey EZ wider with hash, fuck bitches from other state
Valet bringing my cars, the waiter to bring me plates
Smokey EZ wider with hash, fuck bitches from other state
He celebrating buying drinks, we celebrating buying drinks

Time is money why waste it? (Why waste it?)
Got your girly so thirsty, ma can tase it
Say im fly, she wanna hop inside my spaceship
Ask her if she tired of that fake shit
And What? She like

Smokey EZ wider with hash, fuck bitches from other state
Valet bringing my cars, the waiter to bring me plates
Smokey EZ wider with hash, fuck bitches from other state
He celebrating buying drinks, we celebrating buying drinks
Smokey EZ wider with hash, fuck bitches from other state
Valet bringing my cars, the waiter to bring me plates
Smokey EZ wider with hash, fuck bitches from other state
He celebrating buying drinks, we celebrating buying drinks
Bitch! Hahahahaha (The Usual Suspects [x2])
Taylor Gang or die
Yeahhh!
Yeah
songs.title: Ez Wider with Hash
